snippet: There was no immediate claim of responsibility for the bombings in the central city of Rada, but suspicion fell on Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula.
abstract: Two car bombs explode in Rada, Yemen, killing more than two dozen people, including at least 15 children; city has been flash point between Al Qaeda in Arabian Peninsula and Houthi rebels.
lead_paragraph: There was no immediate claim of responsibility for the bombings in the central city of Rada, but suspicion fell on Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula.

headline.main: Car Bombs in Yemen Kill Dozens, Including Schoolchildren
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Deadly Bombs Hit Central City

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
